quoteText:
BibleGateway may offer upgrades or updates to the BibleGateway Widgets in its sole discretion.
BibleGateway may change, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of the BibleGateway Widgets at any time without notice to you.
BibleGateway may also impose limits on certain features and services or restrict your access to parts or all of the BibleGateway Widgets without notice or liability.
title: They may stop providing the service at any time

tosdr.case: They may stop providing the service at any time
